name: Crispy Greek Salad
description: Mixed greens, feta, kalamata olives, cucumbers, artichoke hearts, cherry tomatoes, green peppers, red wine vinaigrette. Served with fresh bread.

name: Fresh Green Pie
description: Basil pesto sauce, mozzarella sauce, feta, roasted eggplant, roasted zucchini, artichoke hearts, fresh tomato.

name: Chocolate Chunk Cookie
description: Cookie filled with chocolate chunks and nuts.

name: Gilafi Paneer
description: Melt in your Mouth fried, bite size paneer and potato balls.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Indian cheese cubes and seasonal vegetables marinated in fragrant spices and grilled in the tandoor.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Loved by all- tender morsels of chicken tikka simmered in a creamy tomato sauce.

name: Paneer Tikka Masala
description: Indian cheese pieces cooked in a creamy tomato sauce.

name: Plain Naan
description: Unleavened bread baked inside the tandoor.
